content.query:
USE nyc_green_taxi_discovery

--identify number of trips made for each borough
SELECT taxi_zone.borough,COUNT(1) as number_of_trips
FROM 
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE='nyc_green_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) 
   AS trip_data
   JOIN
   OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://nyctaxisynapsedl.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-green-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE
    ) 
    WITH(
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(15),
        Zone VARCHAR(50),
        service_zone VARCHAR(15)
    )AS taxi_zone
    ON trip_data.PULocationID=taxi_zone.LocationID
GROUP BY taxi_zone.borough
ORDER BY number_of_trips;
